ISSUE.TITLE: Support GitHub deployment API
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Looks like GitHub has an API to trigger deployments, https://developer.github.com/v3/repos/deployments/. Having support for this would be great as an explicit deployment point can be supported. Probably need to support the specific hook type to be able to access it within the config and then do actual deploys.
